pathfinding

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • pathfinding.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements an object that contains information about an specific tile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile()
      Default constructor Generates a random passable tile Has two different possible types
      Tile(int terrain_id)
      Overloaded constructor generates a new tile with an specific ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLight(int light)
      adds a light value to a tile
      void clear()
      removes any content from a tile and sets it to passable if the terrain ID is different than 0 it sets it to 5
      void clearObjecte()
      removes an object from a tile and sets it to passable
      int getID() 
      int getLight() 
      Subject getObject() 
      int getTerrainID() 
      boolean isPassable() 
      void setID(int id)
      sets the terrain ID of a tile
      void setLight(int light)
      sets the light value of a tile
      void setObjecte(Subject obj)
      Places an object in a tile
      void setPassable(boolean b)
      sets the passable property
      void setWall()
      places a wall in the tile and removes and objects it could have

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile()
        Default constructor Generates a random passable tile Has two different possible types

      • Tile

        public Tile(int terrain_id)
        Overloaded constructor generates a new tile with an specific ID
        Parameters:
        terrain_id - specifies the terrain id of the new tile

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns:
        if the tile contains an object, returns the ID of the object; if not, it returns the terrain ID of the tile

      • getTerrainID

        public int getTerrainID()
        Returns:
        returns the terrain ID of the tile

      • getObject

        public Subject getObject()
        Returns:
        returns the content of the tile

      • getLight

        public int getLight()
        Returns:
        returns the light level of a tile

      • isPassable

        public boolean isPassable()
        Returns:
        returns true if the tile is passable

      • setID

        public void setID(int id)
        sets the terrain ID of a tile
        Parameters:
        id - specifies a terrain ID

      • setPassable

        public void setPassable(boolean b)
        sets the passable property
        Parameters:
        b - specifies whether the tile is passable or not

      • setWall

        public void setWall()
        places a wall in the tile and removes and objects it could have

      • setObjecte

        public void setObjecte(Subject obj)
        Places an object in a tile
        Parameters:
        obj - specifies the object to add

      • setLight

        public void setLight(int light)
        sets the light value of a tile
        Parameters:
        light - specifies the new light value if the value is higher than 100, it will be set to 100

      • addLight

        public void addLight(int light)
        adds a light value to a tile
        Parameters:
        light - specifies the light value to add the value can be negative

      • clearObjecte

        public void clearObjecte()
        removes an object from a tile and sets it to passable

      • clear

        public void clear()
        removes any content from a tile and sets it to passable if the terrain ID is different than 0 it sets it to 5
